Highlights This sailing is a Solar Eclipse Sailing - Witness a once-in-a-lifetime solar eclipse at sea, complete with themed cocktails, eclipse glasses and unforgettable open-air dining beneath a darkened sky. Overnight in Stockholm, Sweden, and get a chance to fully experience the “Venice of the North”. Soak up the city’s lively nightlife or explore its historic streets, waterfront views, and charming neighbourhoods under the moonlight. [Included Shore Excursion in Berlin, Germany] FAIRY TALE CASTLE SCHWERIN -Travel by coach through the gentle Mecklenburg countryside to Schwerin, the region’s charming capital. Admire Castle Schwerin from across its tranquil lake, a romantic island residence straight out of a fairytale. Enjoy a guided tour inside, discovering how a royal family once lived in sumptuous style. Afterwards, take some free time to wander Schwerin’s streets, browsing local shops or enjoying a café by the water.
